document.heading: Repeal of Prostitution Free Zones and Drug Free Zones Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-274, the “Repeal of Prostitution Free Zones and Drug Free Zones Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-760. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 7, 2014, and October 28, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 12, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-473 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-274 became effective May 6, 2015.
